greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of partitions of partitions of n where all partitions have the same sum.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
example: The a(4) = 9 partitions of partitions where all partitions have the same sum:
program: (PARI) a(n)={if(n<1, n==0, sumdiv(n, d, binomial(numbpart(n/d) + d - 1, d)))} \\ _Andrew Howroyd_, Jun 22 2018
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Jun 20 2018
